text: How about being able to create, group and label all the colors you’d need instead of fixed fields?
<@U03MU3H35R6> it’d make brand/design people lives better using HubSpot, which isn’t that friendly to creative folks

I'm surprised this doesn't come up more - looking to have different messaging on the Manage Preferences email template than on the Unsubscribe email template. Right now they use the same template and the module controls what displays, looking for a no-code/no-custom dev fix natively in HubSpot by adding a separate template option. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Unsubscribe-Manage-preference-template/idc-p/1024127#M190314|please upvote this idea>
